name: Case Review Prioritizer with Claim Gateway
description: Case Review Prioritizer with Claim Gateway simulates demographics and reconciles demographics snapshots; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via RIS to improve throughput.

steps.name: Signal Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize encounter summaries from EHR; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: Discover
steps.description: Execute discover phase for the Auto-Retrieval pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Retrieve
steps.description: Execute retrieve phase for the Auto-Retrieval pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Plan Drafting
steps.description: Plan Drafting across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Documentation
steps.description: Documentation across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Optimization
steps.description: Optimization across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Intervention
steps.description: Intervention across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Orchestration
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to EHR; return response JSON for the client.
